alert.note: Alert for Gadsden (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 12:52AM EDT until June 15 at 1:45AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM EDT FOR GADSDEN AND NORTHEASTERN LIBERTY COUNTIES... At 1251 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Quincy to 17 miles south of Greensboro to 14 miles southeast of Blountstown, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Quincy, Greensboro, Chattahoochee, Gretna, Telogia, Littman, Juniper, Douglas City, Mount Pleasant, Hosford, Hardin Heights, Rosedale, Clio, Santa Clara, Hardaway, Sycamore, Quincy Airport, Lowry, Wetumpka and Branchville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
